resources.string: PodQuest é um podcast sobre games com profissionais brasileiros da indústria internacional. Gilliard Lopes (EA), Rafael Kuhnen (Gameloft), Fernando Secco (Bioware) e Igor de Castilho (Gameloft) conversam sobre games, indústria e desenvolvimento, e recebem também outros profissionais convidados.

No PodQuest de hoje, Igor, Fernando e Gilliard atacam de frente uma questão profunda e polêmica: a violência nos games. Porque existe, o que afeta, e como os desenvolvedores lidam com seus games que trazem tiros, socos, crimes hedion Gilliard Lopes, Rafael Kuhnen, Fernando Secco e Igor de Castilho

This is the main Activity, all activities can be acessed by here. It contains the podcast playlist added by the user in option + in toolbar. If the podcast cover selected the PodcastEpisodeActivity will open. Is possible play the current episode selecting play button on bottom bar or select episode to access the PlayerActivity. Picasso API can be used to load url images. If the Donate button in toolbar is selected the DonateActivity will open.
This Activity is used to add a podcast from RSS Feed. EARL (Easy Android RSS Library / https://github.com/einmalfel/Earl) can be used to read and store the Podcast RSS Feed.
This Activity shows the Podcast Episodes. If the podcast cover selected the PodcastEpisodeActivity will open. Is possible play the episode on play button and the PlayerActivity will open.
This Activity is used to play an episode. Android MediaPlayer Framework can be used to stream the Podcast.
This Activity is used for donation to improve the app. Google Pay API can be used for this.
This Activity is used to show the Podcast Episode information.
Help us to improve this app. Make your donation!
